citations.narrative:
*** There is a small section of wire mesh that is broken in the Coatimundi enclosure with the broken wires protruding
into the enclosure. This is a potential hazard to the animal and this section of mesh needs to be maintained in good
repair for the safety of the animal.
*** There are small holes in the wire mesh at the top of the Bushbaby enclosure that need to be repaired. This
section of wire needs to be maintained in good repair for the safety and containment of the animal.
